content: **************************************************** fully tested pattern now available for free download - enjoy ****************************************************** this adorable crochet owl works up in no time using three strands of yarn held together as one and a large hook the pattern is written for four different sizes of owl mini 10 cm 4 in tall small 14 cm 5 ½ in tall medium 18 cm 7 in tall large 22 cm 8 ¾ in tall personally i find them highly addictive and right now i just can t stop making them everyone loves owls they re perfect gifts for a new arrival child s birthday or even a graduation gift and if you don t like the idea of working three strands together just opt for a bulkier yarn instead you will also need wool needle embroidery needle 2 x buttons for eyes any size small piece of thick felt for beak yellow embroidery thread 30cm polyfill stuffing less than 50g
